Class CompiledSearchQuery<TIn, TOut>

Namespace
Nomadik.Core
Assembly
Nomadik.Core.dll

Represents a SearchQuery that has been compiled against A given Expression InitMember Mapper, binding it to a hard type And caching the Expression Mappings for compiling Filter/Search Queries

public class CompiledSearchQuery<TIn, TOut>

Represents a that has been compiled against A given Expression InitMember Mapper, binding it to a hard type And caching the Expression Mappings for compiling Filter/Search Queries
TOut
Represents a that has been compiled against A given Expression InitMember Mapper, binding it to a hard type And caching the Expression Mappings for compiling Filter/Search Queries

Represents a SearchQuery that has been compiled against A given Expression InitMember Mapper, binding it to a hard type And caching the Expression Mappings for compiling Filter/Search Queries

Methods

OrderBy(IQueryable<TIn>)

Uses the bound Order to sort a mapped IQueryable<T> of matching bound TIn. If the Order is null it will just return the same unmodified data

public IQueryable<TIn> OrderBy(IQueryable<TIn> data)

Page(IQueryable<TIn>)

Uses the bound Page to Paginate a mapped IQueryable<T> of matching bound TIn. If the Page is null it will just return the same unmodified data

public IQueryable<TIn> Page(IQueryable<TIn> data)

IQueryable<TIn>

SearchAsync(IQueryable<TIn>)

Runs Where(IQueryable<TIn>), then OrderBy(IQueryable<TIn>), and finally Page(IQueryable<TIn>) back to back. If Pagination is enabled, the total count of unpaged items is simultaneously async queried to populate the Of Property.

public Task<SearchQueryResult<TOut>> SearchAsync(IQueryable<TIn> data)

Parameters

data IQueryable<TIn>

Returns

Task<SearchQueryResult<TOut>>

Select(IQueryable<TIn>)

Leverages a Search's bound MemberInit Expression to perform a LINQ Select Operation on a Query

public IQueryable<TOut> Select(IQueryable<TIn> data)

IQueryable<TOut>

Where(IQueryable<TIn>)

Uses the bound Filter to filter a mapped IQueryable<T> of matching bound TIn. If the Filter is null it will just return the same unmodified data
